short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Redirects ANY visit to twitter.com or x.com toBlueSky

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ditch Twitter (X) and explore something new! This extension makes switching platforms effortless. Whenever you try to visit twitter.com or x.com, including links you click, shortcuts you use, or even by typing the address directly, you'll be automatically redirected to Bluesky No more back-and-forths - just a smooth transition to your new social experience.  This extension works for all types of Twitter access, ensuring you land on bluesky.com every time, regardless of how you try to reach Twitter!
